name: Dig, Dolphin Doug, Dig!
description:
Your name: Dolphin Doug. 

Your mission: burrow through the ground, helping the townsfolk in need. 

Your personality: shy and reclusive. Hence the burrowing.

CONTROLS:

WASD – move gracefully through the dirt

Space – jump majestically into the air

––––––––––

Made for the Portland Indie Game Squad – Summer Slow Jam #1 of 2021 with the themes of "Exploration" and "Forgotten Places" over the course of 12 lovely days.

TEAM:

Pat Farnach – programming & level design

Peter Karman – music & sound design

Alex Benson – art & animation
